sentences.en: She told them that her daughter-in-law was manic-depressive.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他们说她的儿媳妇得了燥狂抑郁病。

sentences.en: With her were her son and daughter-in-law.
sentences.cn: 和她在一起的是她儿子和儿媳。

sentences.en: The son and the daughter-in-law became angry with the old man.
sentences.cn: 儿子和儿媳对老人很生气。
